rows.label: qst300302_msg001
rows.name: Start interview!

rows.label: qst300302_msg002
rows.name: After interview

rows.label: qst300302_msg003
rows.name: Check answers - both correct

rows.label: qst300302_msg004
rows.name: Check answers - one correct

rows.label: qst300302_msg005
rows.name: Check answers - all wrong

rows.label: qst300302_msg006
rows.name: Quest complete

rows.label: qst300302_msg0001
rows.name:
All right, let's begin the
interview. Are you ready?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0011
rows.name: Begin the interview?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0012
rows.name: Begin

rows.label: qst300302_msg0013
rows.name: Wait a little longer

rows.label: qst300302_msg0014
rows.name:
First, the first candidate.
I'm calling them in.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0015
rows.name:
I understand. It's not good to keep
them waiting, so please hurry.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0051
rows.name:
I'd like to ask Rex to do the
interview...[ML:Dash ] Could you switch with him?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0101
rows.name:
Well, we've talked to everyone...[ML:Dash ]
Who do you think is best?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0102
rows.name:
The first is Fisena, a woman with
a straightforward personality.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0103
rows.name:
The second is the Nopon
Powapowa, a gentle person.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0104
rows.name:
The third is the former noble
Zengrid, who doesn't seem like
a bad person at heart.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0121
rows.name: Who should I choose?

rows.label: qst300302_msg0122
rows.name: Fisena

rows.label: qst300302_msg0123
rows.name: Powapowa

rows.label: qst300302_msg0124
rows.name: Zengrid

rows.label: qst300302_msg0151
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]It's decided.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0152
rows.name:
Just having a wonderful woman around
boosts the morale of the men.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0153
rows.name:
A life of constant battle can wear
on the soul...[ML:Dash ] She seems like she
could soothe such members.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0154
rows.name:
He was a bit of a strange person, but I'm
grateful to be able to entrust him with
managing money, which I'm not good at.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0171
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]I'm glad we found a good assistant.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0172
rows.name:
You...[ML:Dash ] you have an eye for
people like the old man, and
you've become a reliable leader.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0173
rows.name: I'm sure the old man is relieved.

rows.label: qst300302_msg0174
rows.name:
We, the Hr√¶svelgr Merc Group,
will continue to improve!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0175
rows.name:
We'll aim to be the best in
Invidia...[ML:Dash ] no, the best in Alst!

rows.label: qst300302_msg0176
rows.name: Please come and check on us again.
